content: If you're looking for a spicy Tirana dish to pair with Ayran, you might want to try Tave Kosi. Tave Kosi is a lamb and yogurt casserole that is cooked with garlic, butter and is flavored with mint. The tanginess of Ayran can help to cool down the spiciness of Tave Kosi and balance out the dish's bold flavors. So, you can enjoy the dish without it being too overwhelming.
